name: dapr-example-invocation
description: An example utilizing the Dapr JS SDK to invoke a service

scripts.start:dapr-grpc: dapr run --app-id example-invocation --app-port 50051 --app-protocol grpc npm run start
scripts.start:dapr-http: dapr run --app-id example-invocation --app-port 50051 --app-protocol http npm run start
